planned_uncertainty_line: I'm not gonna lie—1-2 weeks is tight, but here's how we can make it work...
uncertainty_markers_found: I'm not gonna lie—1-2 weeks is tight
direct_questions_found: What's the turnaround time on reviews?
differentiators_selected: Deep experience with Claude AI and AI-assisted development workflows
Transparency-first approach - comfortable with daily reviews and fact-checking
Proven track record building marketplace MVPs under tight timelines
Fullstack expertise covering both sides of marketplace (buyers and sellers)
Clear communication and fluent English for daily standups
workflow_demo_text: The workflow I use is already built to prevent the exact issues most clients hit at this stage—like scope mismatches and integration delays. You'll see results from Day 1 because the process includes validation gates and artifact logging. Everything's traceable. Every integration gets tested internally before touching your codebase.
